name: Checkpoint Chaser
description:
Drive for as long as you can while dodging traffic so that you can get an invulnerability boost! Watch the meter at the bottom of the screen to see when you can boost.

PC Controls:

  • Arrow keys - Steer left to right
  • Spacebar - Boost / start game

Mobile controls:

  • Tilt device left to right to steer
  • Tap "Boost" text to boost

Assets provided by:

  • Low poly road pack: https://brokenvector.itch.io/low-poly-road-pack
  • Low poly cars: https://kumasousa.itch.io/cars-low-poly-model
  • Music: https://void1gaming.itch.io/free-synthwave-music-pack
